justification: Correctly notes B’s TE weakness and preference for committee RBs/dual-threat QBs, but wrongly assumes QB surplus despite Clark being out. Offers an injured RB (Taylor, Q) to a manager who avoids injuries, undercutting fit. B needs immediate starters and would be left without a healthy QB. Rationale is concise but includes inaccuracies (“without injury risk,” TE1 claim) and overlooks B’s risk tolerance and urgent need at QB.
